column6: Russian, East European, and Eurasian Bibliography & Research Methods
column7: With a focus on Russia, Eastern Europe, and Eurasia, students will investigate this fascinating part of the world, how it has been studied and represented by generations of scholars, scientists, writers, artists, government officials, and others, and how the many fruits of their labors are (or are not) accessible to us today. 3 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours.
column26: Grad Sch of Lib & Info Science
